short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that allows you to place a button on the GitHub pull request screen that allows you to copy LGTM images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application is the easiest way to copy LGTM images on GitHub.

## Usage
1. Install this extension in your browser.
2. Please review it in a pull request in any repository on GitHub.
3. Click "Copy LGTM" button.
4. Now that the LGTM image has been copied, please Approve and paste the image.


## Feature
- LGTM images can be pasted directly from GitHub
- Can randomly paste from among 20 copyright-free images
- Select Approve automatically (opt-in)
- Up to 8 arbitrary LGTM images can be registered (opt-in)
(opt-in functionality can be operated from the extension pop-up)
